Interface CommandListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NopCommandListener

    public interface CommandListener

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommandFailedNoPatternMatch(CommandEvent event, Options options, java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments)
      Triggered when the command failed to execute because the provided arguments doesn't match any registered pattern.
      void onCommandFailedProcessing(CommandEvent event, CommandProcessingException error)
      Triggered when the processing of the command has failed, usually a syntax error.
      void onCommandFailedUnknownOption(CommandEvent event, UnknownOptionException error)
      Triggered when the command was successfully processed but one of the option is not registered in the command.

      Triggered when a command was typed and it was a real command.

      Triggered when a message starts with the prefix but it was a false alert, the command doesn't exist.

      Triggered when a command is found, the user have the correct privileges and what he just typed has been successfully parsed.
      void onTooLowAccessLevel(CommandEvent event)
      Triggered when a command is found but the user doesn't satisfy the AccessLevel associated with this command.

    • Method Detail

      • onCommandReceived

        void onCommandReceived()
        Triggered every time a command is typed (= any message that starts with the prefix

      • onCommandFound

        void onCommandFound(@Nonnull
                    CommandEvent command)
        Triggered when a command was typed and it was a real command. But nothing has been executed yet and no checks have been performed.
        Parameters:
        command - The actual event.

      • onCommandNotFound

        void onCommandNotFound(@Nonnull
                       java.lang.String name,
                       @Nonnull
                       net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message message)
        Triggered when a message starts with the prefix but it was a false alert, the command doesn't exist. An error 404 in a manner.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the command that was typed.
        message - The message containing the wrong command.

      • onTooLowAccessLevel

        void onTooLowAccessLevel(@Nonnull
                         CommandEvent event)
        Triggered when a command is found but the user doesn't satisfy the AccessLevel associated with this command.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that was fired.

      • onCommandSuccessfullyProcessed

        void onCommandSuccessfullyProcessed(@Nonnull
                                    CommandEvent event,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    net.dv8tion.jda.core.utils.tuple.Pair<java.util.List<java.lang.String>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> processedContent)
        Triggered when a command is found, the user have the correct privileges and what he just typed has been successfully parsed.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that was fired.
        processedContent - The output of the command processor.
        See Also:
        CommandProcessor, CommandProcessor.process(String)

      • onCommandFailedProcessing

        void onCommandFailedProcessing(@Nonnull
                               CommandEvent event,
                               @Nonnull
                               CommandProcessingException error)
        Triggered when the processing of the command has failed, usually a syntax error.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that was fired.
        error - The error from the command processor.
        See Also:
        CommandProcessor

      • onCommandFailedUnknownOption

        void onCommandFailedUnknownOption(@Nonnull
                                  CommandEvent event,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  UnknownOptionException error)
        Triggered when the command was successfully processed but one of the option is not registered in the command.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that was fired.
        error - The error from the Options.
        See Also:
        Options

      • onCommandFailedNoPatternMatch

        void onCommandFailedNoPatternMatch(@Nonnull
                                   CommandEvent event,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   Options options,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments)
        Triggered when the command failed to execute because the provided arguments doesn't match any registered pattern.
        Parameters:
        event - The actual event.
        options - The provided options.
        arguments - The provided arguments.

      • onCommandSuccess

        void onCommandSuccess(@Nonnull
                      CommandEvent event)
        Triggered when the command is successfully executed.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that triggered the command in the first place.
